## Gene Details:

- **Gene Name:** sigma factor 4

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [sig4-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Lack of SIG4 in sig4-1 plants cause a strong decrease of ndhF precursor RNA and leads to a strong  decrease of NDH complex amount and activity
